entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
